page.title: 03TOURISM,ULLAPOOL,WESTER ROSS
page.content: Visitors can stay at one of the many hotels,guest-houses,chalets or holiday homes in the village or in the surrounding countryside,There is also a holiday park for campers or caravanners and a Youth Hostel. In the Recreation Park there are all-weather tennis courts,a putting green,crazy-golf and cycles for hire. Pony-trekking or a Wildlife Safari will take the visitor into the hills. The Lochbroom Highland Museum has items of local,social and natural history,the village library has a selection of reading material and there are several shops supplying Highland souvenirs,Scottish knitwear, fishing tackle,sports equipment and groceries. The Highland Stoneware Pottery welcomes visitors to watch them at work.
